PCI: Payment Card Information\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems provides software development and support services to their customers. During this activity, developers connect to customers' remote systems and applications. As the developed applications may handle cardholder data, and remote systems accessed by developers may contain card holder data (CHD), customers require EPAM Systems to perform development and remote support activities in a PCI DSS-compliant manner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems does not store, process or transmit cardholder data in their systems and it is not intended to move any data from customers' systems to those of EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Developers can access customers' Cardholder Data Environment remotely via VPN connection. About photographs\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Photographs, by their nature, may contain sensitive information, particularly when they contain personal sensitive information by revealing persons' racial or ethnic origin, while there are captured situations which merely increase the likelihood of associations. A picture showing someone sitting in a wheelchair, even in the garden of a hospital, could be treated as sensitive, since it might reveal the individual's health status. The sensitivity of such information is obvious if the photo is accompanied with other personal data such as name, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To prevent misinterpretation/security breach, EPAM projects that access personal data shall handle photographs confidentially, like \\\"Sensitive Personal Information.\\\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.6. Data Privacy and Awareness\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data privacy laws regulate the use, handling and cross-border transfer of personal information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM's presence in many countries all over the world requires that the company follow both local and international personal data handling and protection regulations governing the processing, use and storage of personal data.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal Data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", also called\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personally identifiable information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(PII) – at EPAM - is any data that could potentially identify a specific individual. It is any information that can be used to distinguish one person from another and can be used for de-anonymizing anonymous data.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM, PII is sub-divided into two different levels, with different internal processes and controls regarding their usage: Sensitive personal data (sensitive PII) and Confidential data.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sensitive Personal Data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"requires under any data privacy law even higher security standards; if lost, compromised, or disclosed without authorization, it could result in substantial harm, embarrassment, inconvenience or unfairness to an individual.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Confidential data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is any personal data not covered by sensitive personal data.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.6.1.
